characterInfo.Family: Lirin (husband), Kaladin (son),  Tien (son), Oroden (son), Hesina's father
characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings,  Words of Radiance (mentioned), Oathbringer, Rhythm of War

characterDescription:
Hesina is darkeyed, of the second nahn, the wife of Lirin, and mother of Kaladin, Tien and Oroden.
Her home on the outskirts of Hearthstone is larger than typical households of her nahn, due to the inclusion of her husband's surgery room.
